name: VR Galactic Roller Coaster
description:
Experience the crazy Roller Coaster ride in Galaxy / Universe.
This 3D roller coaster will blow your mind with an exciting environment with more than 5 min ride.
Features:
-Amazing space environment with realistic sounds and nature.
-Exciting VR Roller Coaster experience in the Galaxy.
-Get through the fairy stars.

Wishing you a pleasant ride.
